entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries and ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
